<sim>.name: Sim
<sim>.info: She is a veteran actress known for her charismatic presence and deep emotional expression. Her warm smile contrasts with her strong, commanding roles on screen.

<jae>.name: Jae
<jae>.info: Known for his commanding presence and mature charm, he often takes on pivotal, emotionally complex roles. His sharp gaze adds weight to every performance.

<lee>.name: Lee
<lee>.info: A globally recognized actor, he is renowned for his versatile acting and warm smile. His refined appearance blends intensity with approachability.

<yang>.name: Yang
<yang>.info: Wearing a Netflix varsity jacket, he blends a casual and creative vibe with unique personality. His round glasses and natural curls enhance his artistic and approachable look.
